commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: You two!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I knew it! It's Kanan, Mari, and Ai!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: H-Hi.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hey! It's Rin and Hanayo!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Aww, it's the cutie-pie tag team from Î¼'s! What a coincidence!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Cutie-pie tag team?!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: What are you two doing here?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I invited Kayo-chin to lunch! We're about to go for some delicious ramen!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: While we were walking, we saw a group of girls who looked like you, so I gathered up my courage and called out to get your attention.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: And it turns out you were right! Wow, what are the odds?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: So, what are you all doing here? Are you on a day trip?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Ai's showing us around. We're here to soak in all the traditional Japanese ambiance!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I'll have these two hooked on Shitamachi culture by the end of the day! My ultimate goal is to convince them to move here.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: I didn't realize you'd cooked up such scary plans for us.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I think I've already won Mari over. Kanan's still on the fence, but one more push should do it!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: That sounds fun! I wanna be won over, too!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You mean it? As a local, I'm flattered. Let me reward you with a neck scratch! Who's a good kitty?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: *Purr*

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: So, do you two wanna join us for a stroll around town?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Ooh! Can we?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: The more the merrier, if you ask me. What do you say, Kanan?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: No objections! Let's all go together.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Well, if you really don't mind, we'd love to.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: All right. Let's hit the... Oh, right. You guys were going out for ramen first, weren't you?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: You should all come with us! I'll show you one of my favorite ramen restaurants!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Are you sure? I mean, we weren't trying to invite ourselves.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Of course. Meals taste better when you share them with a big group.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Let's go, then! I have some choice places to recommend, too. Wanna restaurant-hop if we've got enough time?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: My stomach always has room for more ramen!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Don't go overboard.
